features: Versatile Storage Bookshelf: The 5 tier tall book shelf with open shelves provides ample storage space, allowing you to showcase your belongings in various directions. Whether you want to organize books, display family photos, or place potted plants, CDs, or decorative items, it is an excellent choice for any purpose.

Sturdy and Durable: Constructed with sturdy MDF and black-coated metal frame, this grey book shelf is built to last. The unique design features metal sidebars and X-shaped back bars, providing constant stability. You can trust the quality and durability of this 5 shelf bookcase, making it a reliable choice for your furniture arrangement.

Stylish Design: This industrial bookshelf is crafted with high-quality wood and iron, providing strong support and durability. With its multi-tier design and unique staggered layout, the wood and metal bookshelf adds an artistic touch and enhances the ambiance of your living room, bedroom, home office.

User-Friendly Design: We have equipped this book shelves with storaqe with an anti-tipping device to ensure it stands securely, providing extra stability for your peace of mind. Additionally, the four adjustable feet not only help maintain the stability of the book rack but also protect the floor from scratches. This thoughtful design not only prioritizes safety but also enhances the overall user experience.

Easy to install: Detailed instructions are included in the package, allowing you to assemble the display shelf quickly. Just follow the step-by-step instructions to connect the components together. No professional skills or experience required - you can install it with ease, saving time and effort.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Grey Bookshelf for Bedroom, Living Room, Home Office This 5 tier open bookshelf has a distinctive industrial style, combining metal and wood materials to perfectly demonstrate the charm of modern industrial aesthetics. Coordinate with other furniture and decorations in the room to enhance the overall aesthetics of the room and add a warm and personal feel to the room.

IDEALHOUSE 5 Tier Bookshelf with Open Display Shelves for Storage Spacious storage space: Multi-level and split-level designs provide you with more storage space and you can place items of different sizes and shapes on different levels as needed. Multi-scenario use: The large bookcase can help you maximize the use of space, and you can display personal collections, artworks and decorations, adding beauty and personalization to the space. Stable Structure: The bookcases and book shelves 5 shelf adopts X-shaped design, providing you with a stable support structure and stylish appearance. It not only increases the stability of the wood bookshelf, but also gives it a unique visual effect.

X-shaped Bracing The X-shaped rod in the back not only enhances the stability of the frame but also adds a touch of elegance to the overall design. Optimize space By placing different items on different shelves, you can use space more efficiently and keep your book case tidy and organized. Sturdy Structure Built with a robust metal frame and thick boards, the storage bookshelf boasts exceptional weight capacity, providing a reliable and durable storage solution for your belongings.

Easy to clean The tall bookcase features a waterproof coating on its particle board surface, making it effortless to wipe clean and maintain its pristine appearance with minimal effort. Anti-tip Accessories Equipped with reliable anti-tip accessories, the industrial bookshelf is well-protected against accidental tipping, providing an extra layer of safety and peace of mind. Adjustable Feet Designed with adjustable feet, the metal bookcase not only enhance stability but also ensure a secure placement on a wide range of surfaces, offering versatility and peace of mind.
Specification Color Grey Material MDF & Metal Type 5 Tiers Weight 43.7 LBS Dimensions 29.1*11.8*61 Inchs Package Includes 1 x Bookshelf, 1 x Instruction, 1 x Accessory Bag

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good shelf for a decent price!
reviews.reviewText: I've bought a very similar shelf prior to this one on amazon that was nearly twice the price. While that one is definitely higher quality/has thicker shelves, this one wins for me in terms of color and general quality for the price. It matches the other furniture I have well and works for what I need. Assembly was also very straightforward (I have assembled plenty of amazon furniture at this point, so that may not be the case for others who have not as the instructions are pictures only). My only complaint is that the L wrench it came with kept getting stuck in some of the screws and that you need to pay close attention to which side of the legs the holes face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Dont waste your money on this. Cheaply made with dent and scratches to the woods, not sturdy, i have to be careful in moving it coz im scared it will fall apart. The bar that supposedly will support it does not have the screws to attach it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Buying a furniture from Amazon sucks.
reviews.reviewText: So far, almost 50% of the furniture that I have bought from amazon has been delivered damaged. However, I can not drop it off to the drop off locations because it is too heavy and I decide to keep them. All the shelves came damaged in one side. It looks fairly good, but kinda sad that they came damaged.

reviews.reviewText: Great bookshelf! Works perfectly where I wanted to put it, and it was so easy to put together!
